question: Being a celebrity - such as famous film star or sports personality - brings problems as well as benefits. Do you think that being a celebrity brings more benefits or more problems?
text: There is a will, there is a way. This quote contains a significant meanings that implies a person who own her willingness to overcome the troubles to get a good position in society. The typical example is famous film stars or singers, those who have paid the high price to devote for her status. However, many people think that the latest trends they bring to is to make the disorder in the development of country. In my opinion, I totally disagree with their view of point.

The first point is the growth of economy in general and particularly in the entertainment aspect. To publish a fabulous video or film, it takes them a lot of time and money to raise it up, such as the expense of daily basic stuff during the process or the payments for actor's salary every per month. Regardless to say, they may organize the public meetings and performance events in foreign and domestic area to build th reputation as well as make money.

Moreover, their contribution is beneficial in the way people choose to relax. The hit songs, the well-known singers and the attractive films, all of these have greatly changed the style of living standard. People can spend the warm moments with family to enjoy the interesting movies, or relax after hard working days through listening to lyric songs and classical ones. Furthermore, we can immerse in slight paradises getting us high in the sky and look yourself for the truth.
More importantly, quite lot of people find their interest and talents in the excellent ways, as a result they is becoming better.
In summary, human is inheritted so lot from those who are celebrities because of their contributions to society and human's life.

error_list.error: occurring among members of a family usually by heredity
